short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import or generate your Bitcoin mnemonics, export your xpubs and sign your PSBTs. Your private keys never leave your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import or create wallets by generating Bitcoin mnemonics, export your xpubs and sign your PSBTs from the comfort of a chrome extension. Your private keys never leave your browser. We don't store data in our servers
